name: Spelling Commander
description:
💻💻💻💻 "Welcome to keyboarding class...
Where you don't use a keyboard. [⌨]  YOU!     USE.    A .  ➤  MOUSE! I will be your instructor for the day.  'CAUSE  THAT'S  HOW  LONG  YOU'LL  LAST."  ♥ Jimmy (▀̿Ĺ̯▀̿ ̿)
You will learn how to spell like never before.
So you better get your S. T. U. double F in order before picking up this game. YOU   A☈E.   THE.
